title: England and Wales Cricket Trust
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701133301im_/http:/typophile.com/files/45f80a755a2b219b3b282c49d41963cd_4143.154460.png)

Does anyone recognise this type? Is it a custom job?
author: col_mcarthur

comments.content:
The style is called semi-serif or demi-serif. this may be custom letters or a custom modification of a serif font.  
Some fonts in this style. Rotis [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/rotis-semi-serif/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701133301/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/rotis-semi-serif/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/rotis-semi-serif/") Areplos [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/areplos/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701133301/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/areplos/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/areplos/") New Age [http://www.identifont.com/show?7BF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701133301/http:/www.identifont.com/show?7BF "http://www.identifont.com/show?7BF") More [http://www.fontscape.com/explore?5KK](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701133301/http:/www.fontscape.com/explore?5KK "http://www.fontscape.com/explore?5KK")  
Don
